name: firebase
description: Security Rules, Cloud Functions, and more
author: Vertua Inc

scripts.build:staging: npm run use:staging && npm run build:staging:firebase
scripts.build:staging:firebase: npm run build:staging:functions && npm run build:firestore
scripts.build:staging:functions: cd functions && npm run config:staging && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:production: npm run use:production && npm run build:production:firebase
scripts.build:production:firebase: npm run build:production:functions && npm run build:firestore
scripts.build:production:functions: cd functions && npm run config:production && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:firestore: cd firestore && firestore-rulez && cd .. && npm run build:firestore:post:mac
scripts.build:firestore:post:mac:
{ printf "rules_version = '2';
" ; cat firestore/firestore.rules ; } > firestore/firestore.rules.tmp && mv firestore/firestore.rules.tmp firestore/firestore.rules
scripts.deploy:staging:functions: npm run build:staging:functions && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:staging:firestore: npm run use:staging && npm run build:firestore && firebase deploy --only firestore
scripts.deploy:production:functions: npm run build:production:functions && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:production:firestore: npm run use:production && npm run build:firestore && firebase deploy --only firestore
scripts.emulators: npm run use:staging && npm run vars:emulator && firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore
scripts.shell: npm run use:staging && cd functions && npm run build && npm run shell
